name.en: Radar system engineering, design and practical Applications II
name.ch: 雷達系統工程設計與實務II

department.en: Department of Space Science and Engineering

goal.en: Cultivate students the theoretical foundation required for radar system engineering and establish radar system-related analysis techniques.
goal.ch: 培養學生雷達系統工程所需之理論基礎，建立雷達系統相關分析技術。

content.en:
1. Advance topics of radar signals and Matched filters
2. Advance topics of Ambiguity functions
3. Propagation effects
4. Detection of target in noise and clutter
5. Pulse compression Techniques
6. MTI ＆ pulse Doppler process Techniques
7. Principle and application of Chung-Li 52MHz VHF radar system
8. Principle and application of CWB Wind Profiler radar system
9. Introduction of Spectrum analyzer and oscilloscope instruments
content.ch:
1. 雷達信號與匹配濾波器進階
2. 雷達混淆方程式進階
3. 電波傳播效應
4. 雜訊與雜波中目標偵測技術
5. 脈波壓縮技術
6. 移動目標指示與脈波都卜勒技術
7. 中壢52MHz特高頻雷達原理與應用
8. 中央氣象局剖風儀雷達系統原理與應用
9. 頻譜儀與示波器介紹

textbook.en: 1. Radar Training Course Material_MIT Lincoln Laboratory 2. Radar Training Course_Dr. Robert M. O‘Donnell 3. Radar Training Course_OHIO_State2013 4. MATLAB Simulations for Radar Systems Design 5. Radar Systems Analysis and Design Using Matlab 6. Radar signals 7. Fast-Fourier-Transform-and-Its-Applications
textbook.ch: 1. 雷達訓練課程_MIT林肯實驗室 2. 雷達訓練課程_博士羅伯特·M·奧唐納 3. 雷達訓練課程_OHIO_State2013 4. 雷達系統設計的 MATLAB 仿真 5. 使用 Matlab 進行雷達系統分析與設計 6. 雷達訊號 7. 快速傅立葉變換及其應用

grading.ch: 平時作業 30％ 期中 報告 30％ 期中 報告 40％

en.competency: Integration of innovation and critical thinking
en.Assessments: Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper)
Assignments ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Practices/Experiments

en.competency: Buildup and Application of numerical models
Presentation and expression of research results
Ability acquirement of interdisciplinary cooperation and teamwork

ch.Assessments: 作業練習 ， 專題研究報告(書面)

ch.competency: 日地系統觀測技術的培養
ch.Assessments: 作業練習 ， 專題研究報告(書面)
口頭報告/口試 ， 專題研究報告(書面)
作業練習 ， 專題研究報告(書面) ， 實作/實驗

ch.competency: 數值模式的建立與應用
ch.Assessments: 作業練習 ， 專題研究報告(書面)

ch.competency: 研究結果的表達及呈現
跨領域與團隊合作的能力

en: Type:Undergraduate Program only.Year:Fourth Year、Fifth Year、Sixth Year、Seventh Year only.
ch: 學制:限學士班。年級:限四年級、五年級、六年級、七年級。
